channel.title: Npc Magic
channel.description: How do I make an npc attack with mage and range?

item.title: Npc Magic
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

umm no… I mean i made a new npc, like literally from scraps of models and it just has the preset health, i know how to fix that. None of the other npc’s in my server attack with mage or range though… so in that lies the problem

Read full topic

item.title: Npc Magic
item.dc:creator: @Lagex Lagex
item.description:
@Lagex wrote:

I’m not going to give you a full on tut, because that wouldn’t teach you anything.

  1. You need to change the emote the character uses.

  2. You need to change the distance apart it can attack (Some sources will automatically do this) (Devoulution)

  3. You need to change their highest-lowest amount of damage

  4. The gfx the npc will preform. (If any)

All of these can be done 1 at a time. Looking them up would be your best bet.

Read full topic
